# To customize the raspberrypi-unattended-installer:
#
# Place your settings in this file as described in the README.md or in the advanced documentation.
ifname=wlan0
packages=nano,curl,htop
firmware_packages=1

timezone=Pacific/Auckland
keyboard_layout=us
system_default_locale=en_NZ.UTF-8
locales=en_NZ.UTF-8

# Turn off password ssh login
ssh_pwlogin=0
root_ssh_pwlogin=0

# Provide an ssh public key
user_ssh_pubkey="ssh-rsa  james@james-ultrabook"

# Setup my user
username=james
userpw=[PASSWORD HERE]
userperms_admin=1
usergpu=1
rootpw=[PASSWORD HERE]


gpu_mem=32

# Configure networking
hostname=rasp-worker2
wlan_country=NZ
